title: The most wonderful interpretations of the king’s dream of seeing a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king: Interpretation of a dream about a king seeing a married woman is one of the visions that many people rush to know the truth about, because this vision indicates the presence of good connections in reality. Or does it carry another sign that causes panic and anxiety in the viewer? Therefore, our Egyptian website provides the full implications of seeing the king in a dream. According to the conclusion reached by dream interpretation scholars, this varies according to the situations that the viewer sees, and the vision also depends on the difference in the viewer himself. A married woman’s vision of the king in her dream is different from an unmarried woman’s vision, and therefore it is different from a pregnant woman’s vision and a man’s vision. So let us get to know these connotations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king. Interpretation of seeing a king in a dream has many important implications, the most important of which are: The king symbolizes prestige, influence, and power. If one sees the king in a dream. This indicates that this person has a great status and that there is a lot of influence that supports him. If someone sees in a dream that an angel is putting a patina on his head and he is sad. This indicates that this person seeks to take a position on someone and that the other person does not accept this position that the fortuneteller wants. This is an indication that this position should be abandoned if the viewer does not have a close relationship with it, such as communication with the other person. Because he took what he had no right to take. But if one sees in a dream that the king is placing the crown on his head, then the king and the major will be happy with this situation. This indicates that this person will enjoy a high position in his job if he seeks it in his job. If one sees in a dream that a crown has been placed over his head by the king and he removes this crown from his head. This indicates that this person seeks in any way to spoil the success of the fortuneteller. So that he does not outperform him in his work. This is an indication that this person should pay attention. So that the dreamer does not fall into ways that harm him and hinder him from achieving this superiority to which he aspires. If a person sees in a dream that he is sitting on the king’s throne. This indicates that this person will have a prominent position in his scientific life. If he expects to get a degree? This indicates that he will rise to this rank with excellence that he did not expect. If the fortune teller is a merchant; This indicates that this person will gain the satisfaction of the Lord of Glory - Glory be to Him - and will benefit from his trade a lot and a lot of money. The vision of the Arab king is interpreted as good news for the dreamer. If one sees that the crowned king is an Arab king. This indicates that goodness has arrived for this person and should herald a happy life. But if one sees that the king is not an Arab. This vision does not indicate good, but many obstacles that the viewer will face will follow this vision and he must be careful of what he encounters. Seeing a gift from the king in a dream for someone can indicate that the dreamer has a close relationship with many people and gets complete love from all of them. Whoever knows him, it also indicates that the gift goes between him and others out of envy and hatred. Seeing the king in a dream may mean that this person will face an unfortunate event

title: The correct interpretations of seeing an old house in a dream

preview.html: Old House in a DreamAn old house in a dream is often a bad dream because walking into an old house or an abandoned house is scary, whether it is day or night. Have you ever seen yourself walking into an old house or an abandoned house? If you have already seen this vision, this article aims to clarify the meaning of this vision for all groups, as reported by dream interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation of seeing the old house in a dream? Some jurists said that seeing the old house is good news that the fortuneteller will soon be informed of the good news. But if This house is ruined and ruined, so it is not a good omen because it means the illness or death of a relative. Seeing the old house in a dream is for the lady, and the house she saw in her dream was her house, and she saw that it had been destroyed or destroyed, and this is evidence that she lost one of her close friends. This vision means That the dreamer will not succeed in his work and will lose his effort and may suffer from a health illness, but if the house is beautiful, the interpretation of the dream in this case will differ and it means here that the dreamer will live in a better house than the house he currently lives in. Seeing it in good condition shows a sense of harmony and harmony. In real life, because a house is a place where a person rests and feels safe. Building a house in a dream means positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s old houseIbn Sirin believes that a dream about an old house varies from person to person, which means that his interpretation for an unmarried girl It differs from its interpretation of married, divorced, and pregnant women, as well as men and women. In general, this dream means that the dreamer feels a lack of care for those around him, and this person may ignore important things in the world, or that the dreamer has a health problem and does not care about himself. If the old house is burning and burning, this is a warning to the person who sees this vision because he is doing things It may affect his life badly, requiring him to leave or stay away from it immediately. If one sees that he is interested in the plants in this old house, this means that he is only interested in material matters and needs to be interested in spiritual matters as well, or he lacks the emotional attention he needs. If a person restores the old house, it means that he develops his personality, but if he draws it, then in real life he is one of the people who cares about his health. Seeing the demolition of the old house means that there is someone who wants to harm your family, separation or family quarrel. If one sees that he is lost in a house Old, this means that he is going through difficult times that have led to imbalance in his thinking and disorder in his thoughts. Interpretation of the old house in a dream by Gustav MillerIn general, Miller interpreted this vision as receiving good news, but if the old house is dilapidated, this may lead to illness or death A relative, and it may also mean failure at work and dealing with health problems, but if the house is beautiful, this means that the dreamer has moved to a better house than his own. What is the interpretation of a dream about an old house for a single woman? A dream about an old house for single womenThe old house

title: Interpretation of a dream about offering a seed in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of a gift of crops in a dream When we search for a dream interpretation of a gift of crops in a dream and find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to learn to interpret, let us get to know it. Interpretations of this dream by diligent scholars, and the reader must realize that the site managers do not make interpretations, but rather they are interpretations from the heart of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about offering a seed in a dream In the event that there is a vision of donating crops in a dream, it may indicate the abundant goodness that the dreamer may gain during This period, and God knows best. Dreaming of receiving a seed as a gift in a dream may indicate abundant money that the dreamer may acquire during this time. If one sees that he received a seed in a dream as a gift, this may indicate an abundance of luck and good events that may happen to the dreamer in the future. His life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving saffron in a dream: It is possible that seeing a gift of saffron in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good morals, and God knows best. Dreaming about giving saffron in a dream may indicate the good nature of the vision and his closeness to those around him. If one sees that he is giving Saffron for those around him, this may indicate the good deeds he does for others thanks to God. In the event that you see a gift of saffron in a dream, it may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a mother giving gold to her daughter in a dreamIf the girl sees that her mother She was giving her gold as a gift, so this may indicate that she will be fine at that time, and God knows best. A dream of a mother giving gold in a dream to her daughter may indicate the wide life that the girl may have in those days. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is receiving gold from her mother in The dream may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during that period. If one sees a mother throwing her daughter in a dream, this may indicate her assuming a high position and her success in practical life, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream. A woman who sees her husband giving her a nightgown It may indicate positive changes occurring in their lives during this time, thanks to God. A husband’s dream of giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the emotional closeness that occurs between them at this time, and God knows best. It is possible to see the husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream. It may indicate the fulfillment of desires and desires during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate a happy event coming to the family in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a black rosary in a dream. Giving a black rosary in a dream may indicate It indicates the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer may gain during this time, and God knows best. A person dreams that he receives a black rosary in a dream as a gift, which may indicate a lot of money and a great source of livelihood that he can obtain in those days. In the event that one sees himself taking Black rosary in a dream, this may indicate goodness that will come to him in the coming season, thanks to God. Everyone

title: Interpretation of a dream about riding a bike with someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about riding bicycles with someone in a dream are carriers of scientific interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle with someone in a dream Riding a bicycle in a dream can indicate renewal that is occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time, and God knows best. Anyone who dreams that he is riding a bicycle may It indicates happiness and good events that will come to the dreamer in those days. Dreaming of riding a bike with someone in a dream may indicate the success of that person in his professional life in those days, and God knows best. Seeing someone riding a bicycle in a dream may mean that the dreamer will get a lot Of the money and allocations that will come his way in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes from the mosque in a dream. Stealing shoes from the mosque in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s commitment to worship and obedience, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of stealing shoes from the mosque may indicate doing undesirable things. At this time, and God knows best. In the case of dreaming of stealing shoes from the mosque in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has turned away from God, Blessed and Most High, and he must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. Whoever sees in his dream that he stole shoes when he left The mosque, this may indicate a sin that he continues to commit, and he must repent and return to the Blessed and Most High. Interpretation of a dream about black pimples appearing on the face in a dream: The appearance of black pimples in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is subject to envy from those close to him. In the event that a vision of black pimples appears on the face The face in a dream may indicate a warning sign of the dreamer’s distance from God Almighty. A dream of black pimples appearing on the face may indicate that the dreamer is distancing himself from some good people in his life and they are doing bad deeds. Whoever sees in his dream the appearance of black pimples on his face may indicate that To serious mistakes that may happen to him in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my infant son’s teeth appearing in a dream: The appearance of a child’s teeth in a dream may indicate good things coming to the dreamer in the coming period. A dream about my son’s teeth appearing in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer During this period of his life. Whoever sees in his dream that his son had teeth when he was a child, this may indicate the upcoming good things that the dreamer will have in his life in the coming period. A woman’s dream that her child has teeth could indicate future joys for the dreamer In your life during the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about visiting the house of my deceased grandfather in a dream: In the event that a person saw that he was visiting the house of his deceased grandfather, this may indicate the kinship that the dreamer enjoyed in his life in those days. In the event that there is a vision of a visit The house of the deceased grandfather in a dream, this may indicate solidarity among family members during this time. Whoever dreams that he was visiting the house of his deceased grandfather in a dream could indicate obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother hitting My mother in a dreamAnyone who sees in a dream that his brother

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating berries

preview.html: It also indicates his great religiosity and closeness to the worship of God Almighty in his life, and it also indicates freedom from sins and immorality in his life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing eating berries in a dream for one girl: Seeing an unmarried woman eating red berries means her close marriage to a good and righteous man. Watch distribution Berries and eating them in a dream indicate the happiness that the dreamer enjoys in her life. He explains that he took the berries from a stranger and ate them in exchange for money that he will receive soon, God willing. Eating green berries for unmarried women indicates their closeness to the worship of God and their great devotion to their religion. And if she gives the berries To her family and eat it with them, this indicates the good things that she does. Seeing in a dream that she is distributing berries to the poor and eating them, explains her success in many matters. An unmarried girl who craves and eats berries is interpreted by happiness and keeping away from sins in her life. Seeing a mulberry tree in a dream Eating from it is a sign that a good man is approaching her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing berries in detail in a dream. Interpretation of watching eating berries in a dream for a married woman. The married woman says that she is sitting next to the mulberry tree and eating from it, indicating that her husband is a good man. Seeing yourself eating berries Red in the solution indicates an increase in money and survival for a married woman. If she gives berries to guests and eats with them, this is a sign that someone close to her will get married soon. A vision of taking berries from the unknown and eating a lot of them explains the happiness that is approaching her. Whether she is observing the search for Seeing berries and eating them in a dream is a clear indication that she will become pregnant in the near future. Eating green berries in a dream for a married woman indicates her great religiosity and adherence to the religion of God. A married woman holding berries and eating them shows that she is avoiding sin in her life. Seeing a married woman storing berries and eating them indicates On her salvation from immorality, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing eating berries in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that she is eating green berries, this indicates her closeness to the worship of God Almighty. And if a divorced woman sees that there are a lot of berries in her house and eating them is evidence of goodness in her life. And if she distributes green berries And she ate it in a dream, this indicates that she is doing well in all her affairs. A divorced woman who sees berries and eating them is interpreted as marrying a good man who has money. If she sits next to a mulberry tree and eats from it, she will get a job full of livelihood. A divorced woman who dreams that she is eating Many berries reveal a large amount of her money, God willing. Eating red berries in a dream for a divorced woman indicates her marriage and the birth of sons and daughters, God willing. Eating berries in a dream indicates great projects in which this divorced woman will begin her life. title: Interpretation of a knife in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Seeing a knife in a dream, either stabbing or buying it was lost. I dreamed of a knife in my hand, threatening that I stabbed myself with a knife in the stomach, according to Ibn Sirin and others. A knife in a dream is one of the dreams of a special nature. Through our topic today we will learn the interpretation of seeing a knife in a dream, whether For a married or pregnant woman, as the knife is one of the tools that we deal with. It is used in a number of different forms and areas of life, and we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a knife in a dream. Interpretation of a knife in a dream: Seeing a knife in a dream symbolizes a connection with a life partner. It also symbolizes the dreamer’s access to money and abundance of livelihood. And seeing it is good news for comfort and getting rid of worries and sorrow. Also, seeing a knife in a dream is good news for achieving the dreamer’s goals and desires. Seeing a knife in a dream shows the wife, so whoever sees the knife in his hand will get married if he is single, and if he is married and his wife is pregnant, the pregnancy is safe. But If you see in your dream that you are holding a kitchen knife and do not use it, then you will have a good son or a wise son. And if you use a knife in a dream to cut something meat, vegetables, or grains, then you are cutting a problem and making the right decision. An iron knife in a man’s hand is his strength and power. For a woman, many knives symbolize enemies or unjust tongues. If you dream that you are giving someone a knife, then you will hurt them and cause them problems. The knife in the interpretation is a symbol of the ruler because the ruler is a knife against the rulers. Seeing a knife and being hit with it in a dream symbolizes difficulties and disturbances that negatively affect the dreamer. Seeing a stab wound in the abdomen also symbolizes family disputes for the dreamer. Also, seeing a stab wound and blood bleeding from the wound symbolizes hostility and competition with one of the dreamer’s surroundings. As for the lack of blood or its appearance in the dream, it is a good vision. Seeing a person being killed with a knife symbolizes sins. The killer is in reality and he must repent to Almighty God and turn away from the ways of sin. As for the dreamer’s vision of stabbing and death, it symbolizes the dreamer’s negligence in many matters in religious life and he needs to re-examine himself. The vision of sheep being slaughtered also symbolizes the end of many things that brought happiness to the dreamer. Such as the dreamer’s separation from his life partner or his resignation from his job. Interpretation of the knife in one dream. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she owns a knife, this is her interpretation of failure in the next stage or an expression of her inability to manage matters. As for a beautiful knife in a single dream, it symbolizes ambition and distant desires generally associated with work and money. Seeing a knife in a dream is a symbol of answering prayers and achieving goals that one girl has always sought to achieve. Also, seeing a knife in a dream symbolizes an imminent marriage, God willing. Likewise Seeing a knife may symbolize a lot of money that the girl will get soon. The knife also symbolizes the girl’s prestigious job and her arrival at a new promotion. Interpretation of a knife in a dream for a married woman: If you are a married woman and you see in your dream that you are carrying

title: Interpretation of dreams about my unmarried sister’s engagement in a dream

preview.html: Are you looking for an interpretation of a dream about a sister’s engagement? You are in the right place, my dear. The question is often asked about the interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream or seeing a suitor in a dream, so today we will talk in detail about the interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream. Perhaps this article will be a reference for everyone who sees in his dream an engagement or a person who is engaged or He sees his engagement to an unknown person, or he sees the engagement of a sister, friend, or divorced woman in a dream, so in this article we will give you a detailed explanation of this dream based on the interpretations of the most famous dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a sister’s engagement. It is important to realize that commitment in a dream often heralds good news and good days. Coming, not only in terms of personal and emotional life but also professional, social, and more. Interpretations say that seeing a dream of a sister’s engagement in a dream is a wonderful indication of the affection and love you have for your sister and it can also mean good news. Seeing a younger sister’s engagement in a dream indicates happiness And bliss, especially since having a younger sister in your life has benefits that you had never thought about before. Scientists say that seeing a sister’s engagement (whether she is older or younger) means that you will hear good news related to her, either her success or achieving the highest grades, or even what she saw in The dream is as it is, and one of the interpreters says this previous interpretation is if the sister is unmarried. But if the sister is married, this means that she will fulfill her dreams and may give birth to a child in the near future. Interpretation of dreams for engagement If you see that you are engaged to a girl, then you are looking forward to getting the world and getting from it. On how much you pledged in the engagement. If you see that you are engaged to a married girl, this means that you are searching for life. And if you see that you are engaged to a girl and that she is kind and beautiful, then you will get what you need. The dream often indicates that you will get joy and happiness. And if you see that the girl comes To address you, life is tending to you and getting to know you. If a person dreams that he is preparing for an engagement while he is a single young man, this means that a feeling of loneliness is controlling him and that he desires to achieve security in his life. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of senior dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. And if you see that you are attending your father’s engagement, this indicates that you are looking for character. And if you are engaged and see in your dream that you are engaged, this indicates the speed with which you make the necessary decisions in life without wisdom. It could be Getting engaged in a dream is a sign of acceptance of your marriage and a feeling of security, joy, happiness, and comfort. If you see your engagement in a dream, this means the feelings that you will feel in married life. If you dream that you are buying your engagement dress in the dream, this indicates that you are ready for a trip and you have to be careful because there are risks Facing you. And if you dream that you are wearing an engagement ring and that you are cutting the ribbon, this indicates that you will find a new job. If you see yourself dancing at your engagement, this indicates that there are financial problems in married life and that you will overcome them as soon as possible.

title: The most prominent 50 interpretations of cooking chicken in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Cooking chicken in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness and blessings, as chicken is one of the most delicious and famous foods in its many forms and variety, about the type of chicken and how to cook it. Cooking chicken in a dream What is the interpretation of cooking chicken in a dream? Interpretation of a dream of cooking chicken It often portends many joyful events that will bring about many changes in various fields. If the dreamer sees that he is cooking chicken for a group of people, this means that he has a degree of knowledge and culture, which qualifies him to reach a good position among the people who benefit from his knowledge. But if someone else cooks for the fortune teller, this is a sign of obtaining a new source of livelihood that provides him with a more luxurious and prosperous life. The interpretation of this vision also differs depending on how the chicken is exposed to cooking, whether it is fried, grilled or grilled, as well as according to its shape and type. If someone cooks grilled chicken, this is a sign that he plans his life well and arranges it correctly so that he knows how to get what he wants. As for boiling chicken in water, it expresses the person who wants to achieve his goals and achieve his ambitions in life without making any effort or being exposed to fatigue and hardship. What is the interpretation of cooking chicken In a dream for Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin interprets cooking chicken as one of the good visions that portend many countless good blessings, and its interpretation varies according to the cooked pot and the cooking method. If a person boils a large amount of chicken in a large pot, this means that he is a righteous person who does many good deeds and God will reward him well for this (God willing). As for the one who sees a man grilling chicken for him, this is an indication that he will start a small project that will achieve profits and gains and will be a source of livelihood for many. Pema shui Chicken can warn of some bad news, perhaps something dear to the viewer or a goal that he wanted to achieve and sought a lot in the past period, but he will fail. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google. Cooking chicken in a dream for a single woman This vision often indicates that she is about to start a new life in which many of her usual habits will change, and she may get married and be responsible for the home and family. But if she cooks the chicken carefully and carefully, this means that she is making a strenuous effort and exhausting herself to achieve one of her important goals in life. If she sees someone cooking for her, this A sign that she will succeed in one of the fields and reach a degree of fame, perhaps she will join a prestigious job or hold an important position in the state. Also, seeing her cooking chicken for someone she knows indicates that she is living a strong love story and is interested in pleasing and making her lover happy, and her mind is busy thinking about him all the time. But if she cooks a large amount of chicken, this indicates that she will soon marry a wealthy person who will provide her with a life full of all means of luxury and comfort. Cooking chicken in a dream for a married woman According to most opinions, this vision indicates an explosion and a significant improvement in the standard of living of the owner of the dream and all members of her family. If she sees herself cooking a lot of

title: What is the interpretation of a man crying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A man crying in a dream. Interpreters believe that the dream symbolizes goodness and also carries negative interpretations in some cases. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a man crying and the connotations of the dead and the old man crying in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. The crying man in a dream by Ibn SirinThe Man Who cries in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about a man who cries in a dream indicates that he will soon find a job opportunity outside the country and will travel and achieve many achievements during the travel period. Interpreters believe that the interpretation of a dream about a single man crying brings him good news that he will soon marry a beautiful and fair woman who cares about him. A lot and you try to make him happy in every way. If the dreamer sees himself crying at a funeral and screaming during the vision, this means that he feels remorse for a mistake committed in the past and the dream is a warning to him to forget the past and strive to build his future. And if the dreamer is married and his wife is pregnant and he sees her in a dream crying and screaming because of Pregnancy pains, this portends bad news, as it appears that the pregnancy is not complete, and God Almighty. He is the best and most familiar with this period of time. The crying man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that crying in a dream symbolizes hearing sad or disturbing news that happens to the dreamer, and the dream also indicates a major problem that leads to negative changes in the dreamer’s life. An indication that the man is suffering from Severe pain, and the vision may also symbolize his loss of money and his inability to meet the material needs of his family. It is said that the dream indicates wasting time and effort on trivial and useless matters. If the dreamer sees himself crying softly and calmly in his dream, this means that he is relieved of distress, and hears Good news, overcomes obstacles and removes problems and worries. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. The most important interpretations of a man crying in a dream. Seeing a man crying in a dream. If the dreamer sees a friend crying and screaming in his dream, this means that this person is going through a difficult period in his life and needs help from the person who had the vision, so he must provide him with a helping hand and stand up. beside him. He overcomes this crisis, and if the visionary is trying to repent for a certain sin and dreams that he is praying and crying, then the dream conveys good news to him that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will accept his repentance and give him the initiative. The path of righteousness, and you will not return to this sin again. A dead man crying in a dream. The dream indicates that the dreamer longs for the dead person he dreams of and is suffering from the pain of loss. To get rid of feelings of sadness indicates the good condition of the deceased in the afterlife, but if the deceased is the father of the person who had the vision, then the dream symbolizes the emergence of a health problem for him in the coming period. Therefore, he must be careful. An old man who cries in a dream indicates that the person with insight feels stable and psychologically comfortable during this period, but if the old man cries when he is angry in a dream, this indicates that the person with insight will face many problems.

title: Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, we will examine for you the interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin and find out its meaning in different cases. The heir is the prince who inherits power from his father in the event of death or abdication of the throne. The throne of government, and rules the state either by a set of royal decrees or constitutional laws, a position that only deals with royal systems of government, but seeing a prince in a dream is one of the most mysterious dreams that carries a lot. Different interpretations we will mention to you in the following lines in the encyclopedia, where you can see the interpretation of the dream of the caliph by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing the heir generally indicates the high position that the dreamer enjoys in reality, whether in science or religion. Ibn Sirin explained that an unmarried young man seeing a prince in a dream is a good vision for him and indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. But if the dreamer is poor in reality and dreams of this vision, then this dream indicates a change in circumstances for the better and the acquisition of money, and God knows best. And if The dreamer saw that he was the prince himself in a dream and took off his crown. This vision is abhorrent and shows his neglect of his family and his injustice towards them. Interpretation of the dream of an heir for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried girl, seeing the prince proposing to her, this vision indicates goodness and happiness. The prince in one dream symbolizes... In reality, to a wealthy person, merchant, or business manager. If she sees a prince in a dream giving her a golden ring, this vision indicates that a young man is proposing to her, and God knows best. But if she sees the prince wearing elegant white clothes, this vision indicates her marriage to a man of good reputation and occupies a position. Prestigious, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if an unmarried woman dreams of receiving a gift from a prince, which is a necklace, or a dress, or money, or a bottle of perfume, or a watch, or a key, then it is a vision that symbolizes her kindness and livelihood. Seeing an unmarried woman in Dreaming that she has become a princess means excellence and success, and this dream also indicates finding a new job opportunity. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she is eating food with a prince, then it is one of the visions that indicate goodness and food. Seeing the prince of another country in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her marriage. From a foreign person, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, seeing a prince in a dream symbolizes her husband in reality or her son. Seeing a prince in a dream indicates the high status she enjoys among her family and friends, and this The dream indicates success and superiority. One of the symbols of seeing a prince in a dream for a married woman is that it indicates happiness and stability of marital life and the extent of her husband’s love for her. In the interpretation of this vision, it was said that a married woman saw that her daughter had become a princess, so this vision indicates her success and superiority, and it also indicates Her marriage to a wealthy man, and God knows best. Interpretation of the Caliph in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing the heir in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the fulfillment of what she hopes for.
